Text: Reactions November is now live onlineThe latest edition of the financial magazine for the global insurance market is now live at You can contact us for help at mailto or The November Issue of the worlds leading insurance and reinsurance magazine is packed full of news views and figures simply hit the links at the bottom of each item to see the full article The November Features Racebased underwriting Haunted by a racist past The discovery of continued racebased underwriting in the US will cost life insurers involved millions of dollars and do untold damage to their reputations as well as severely embarrassing state regulators viewStoryaspid Integrated Risk Management We can work it out The new actuaries reckon they can measure abstruse business risks and then integrate them with known risks But is there madness in their method viewStoryaspid MGA business The need for continuity viewStoryaspid Capital adequacy That capital question viewStoryaspid AM Bests top buyers and sellers in the US A time of change viewStoryaspid Buyers the biggest risers and fallers viewStoryaspid Sellers the biggest risers and fallers viewStoryaspid The fall of Reliance Errant insurers battle for survival viewStoryaspid In the spotlight Harry Rhulen viewStoryaspid For more information about the sponsors of wwwReactionsnetcom please visit their official websites at Renaissance Re holdings weeks of essential insurance newsColleague You have now had weeks of access to Reactions online and received the magazine We hope you are finding our cutting edge coverage of the insurance reinsurance and associated financial markets informative and valuable Thousands of insurance and financial professionals find Reactions an indispensable guide to the industry We will be delighted to give you further information as to how you take out a subscription and guarantee that you have regular uninterrupted access to this resource In case you have not yet had a chance to use the service we are resending you your username and password Once you have logged on for the first time you will not have to log on again Address of site Instructions Simply click on the address to go straight to the Reactions web site Then select any story by double clicking on its title You will be asked to submit your username and password once and from then on access will be immediate If you have any problems logging onto or using this site please contact our help desk on or mailto Best regards Maeve Doherty Marketing You can access the Reactions website with userid Kaminski and password Reactions
